May 19, 1978 D Scouthead (Whit Friday)
Scouthead (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Saddleworth scouthead-whit-friday
Huddersfield Road, Scouthead Best local - Slaithwaite. Best youth - Queensbury. Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £30 and trophy, 3rd £20 and trophy. 1st annual contest. 27 bands competed.
